mapper.select:
select DISTINCT TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ID C_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve10 reserve10_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID C_PARENT_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ENAEM C_ENAEM_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CNAME C_CNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FCNAME C_FCNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_BASE_CODE C_BASE_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_EDESCRIDE C_EDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CDESCRIDE C_CDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FDESCRIDE C_FDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CREATE_USER C_CREATE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CTIME C_CTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UP_USER C_UP_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UPTIME C_UPTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELTE_USER C_DELTE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELUSER C_DELUSER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR C_DR_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_TIMESTAMP C_TIMESTAMP_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.RESERVE1 RESERVE1_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve2 reserve2_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve3 reserve3_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve4 reserve4_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve5 reserve5_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve6 reserve6_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve7 reserve7_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve8 reserve8_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve9 reserve9_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE C_MAT_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP
from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1=1
start with 1=1
AND TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE like '%' || #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID like '%' || #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cParentIdTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and C_ENAEM like '%' || #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cEnaemTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and C_CNAME like '%' || #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cCnameTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
connect by prior C_PARENT_ID = C_MAT_CODE order by C_MAT_CODE asc

SELECT DISTINCT TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ID C_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve10 reserve10_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID C_PARENT_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ENAEM C_ENAEM_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CNAME C_CNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FCNAME C_FCNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_BASE_CODE C_BASE_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_EDESCRIDE C_EDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CDESCRIDE C_CDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FDESCRIDE C_FDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CREATE_USER C_CREATE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CTIME C_CTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UP_USER C_UP_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UPTIME C_UPTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELTE_USER C_DELTE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELUSER C_DELUSER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR C_DR_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_TIMESTAMP C_TIMESTAMP_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.RESERVE1 RESERVE1_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve2 reserve2_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve3 reserve3_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve4 reserve4_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve5 reserve5_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve6 reserve6_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve7 reserve7_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve8 reserve8_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve9 reserve9_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE C_MAT_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP
from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1=1 START WITH C_PARENT_ID = #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR C_MAT_CODE = C_PARENT_ID and TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR ='0'

SELECT DISTINCT TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ID C_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve10 reserve10_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID C_PARENT_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ENAEM C_ENAEM_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CNAME C_CNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FCNAME C_FCNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_BASE_CODE C_BASE_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_EDESCRIDE C_EDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CDESCRIDE C_CDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FDESCRIDE C_FDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CREATE_USER C_CREATE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CTIME C_CTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UP_USER C_UP_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UPTIME C_UPTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELTE_USER C_DELTE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELUSER C_DELUSER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR C_DR_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_TIMESTAMP C_TIMESTAMP_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.RESERVE1 RESERVE1_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve2 reserve2_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve3 reserve3_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve4 reserve4_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve5 reserve5_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve6 reserve6_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve7 reserve7_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve8 reserve8_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve9 reserve9_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE C_MAT_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP
from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1=1 START WITH C_PARENT_ID = #{iwipMgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbMatterGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR C_MAT_CODE = C_PARENT_ID and TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR ='0'

insert.foreach:
insert into TB_ATTR_GROUP
RESERVE10,
C_PARENT_ID,
C_ENAEM,
C_CNAME,
C_FCNAME,
C_BASE_CODE,
C_EDESCRIDE,
C_CDESCRIDE,
C_FDESCRIDE,
C_CREATE_USER,
C_CTIME,
C_UP_USER,
C_UPTIME,
C_DELTE_USER,
C_DELUSER,
C_DR,
C_TIMESTAMP,
RESERVE1,
RESERVE2,
RESERVE3,
RESERVE4,
RESERVE5,
RESERVE6,
RESERVE7,
RESERVE8,
RESERVE9,
C_MAT_CODE,
C_ID,
#{item.reserve10TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cParentIdTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cEnaemTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cCnameTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cFcnameTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update.foreach:
update TB_ATTR_GROUP
RESERVE10 = #{item.reserve10TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_PARENT_ID = #{item.cParentIdTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ENAEM = #{item.cEnaemTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CNAME = #{item.cCnameTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_FCNAME = #{item.cFcnameTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_BASE_CODE = #{item.cBaseCodeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_EDESCRIDE = #{item.cEdescrideTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CDESCRIDE = #{item.cCdescrideTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_FDESCRIDE = #{item.cFdescrideTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CREATE_USER = #{item.cCreateUserTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CTIME = #{item.cCtimeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_UP_USER = #{item.cUpUserTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_UPTIME = #{item.cUptimeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_DELTE_USER = #{item.cDelteUserTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DELUSER = #{item.cDeluserTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_DR = #{item.cDrTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIMESTAMP = #{item.cTimestampTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESERVE1 = #{item.reserve1TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE2 = #{item.reserve2TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE3 = #{item.reserve3TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE4 = #{item.reserve4TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE5 = #{item.reserve5TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE6 = #{item.reserve6TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE7 = #{item.reserve7TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE8 = #{item.reserve8TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE9 = #{item.reserve9TbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MAT_CODE = #{item.cMatCodeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE 1 = 1 and C_ID = #{item.cIdTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

delete.foreach: delete from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1 = 1 and C_ID = #{item.cIdTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ID C_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve10 reserve10_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID C_PARENT_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ENAEM C_ENAEM_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CNAME C_CNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FCNAME C_FCNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_BASE_CODE C_BASE_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_EDESCRIDE C_EDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CDESCRIDE C_CDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FDESCRIDE C_FDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CREATE_USER C_CREATE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CTIME C_CTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UP_USER C_UP_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UPTIME C_UPTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELTE_USER C_DELTE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELUSER C_DELUSER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR C_DR_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_TIMESTAMP C_TIMESTAMP_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.RESERVE1 RESERVE1_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve2 reserve2_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve3 reserve3_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve4 reserve4_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve5 reserve5_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve6 reserve6_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve7 reserve7_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve8 reserve8_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve9 reserve9_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE C_MAT_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP
from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1=1
and TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID IS NULL
and LENGTH(TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID) = 6
START WITH TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE = #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR C_MAT_CODE = C_PARENT_ID
select max(C_CNAME) from TB_ATTR_GROUP where 1=1 and C_MAT_CODE = #{cMatCode}
select max(C_MAT_CODE) from tb_attr_group where c_parent_id = #{cMatCode}

select DISTINCT TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ID C_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve10 reserve10_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID C_PARENT_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ENAEM C_ENAEM_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CNAME C_CNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FCNAME C_FCNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_BASE_CODE C_BASE_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_EDESCRIDE C_EDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CDESCRIDE C_CDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FDESCRIDE C_FDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CREATE_USER C_CREATE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CTIME C_CTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UP_USER C_UP_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UPTIME C_UPTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELTE_USER C_DELTE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELUSER C_DELUSER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR C_DR_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_TIMESTAMP C_TIMESTAMP_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.RESERVE1 RESERVE1_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve2 reserve2_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve3 reserve3_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve4 reserve4_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve5 reserve5_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve6 reserve6_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve7 reserve7_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve8 reserve8_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve9 reserve9_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE C_MAT_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP
from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1=1
AND TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID = #{iwipMgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbMatterGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and length(c_mat_code) = 10 ORDER BY c_mat_code

select DISTINCT TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ID C_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve10 reserve10_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID C_PARENT_ID_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_ENAEM C_ENAEM_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CNAME C_CNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FCNAME C_FCNAME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_BASE_CODE C_BASE_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_EDESCRIDE C_EDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CDESCRIDE C_CDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_FDESCRIDE C_FDESCRIDE_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CREATE_USER C_CREATE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_CTIME C_CTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UP_USER C_UP_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_UPTIME C_UPTIME_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELTE_USER C_DELTE_USER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DELUSER C_DELUSER_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_DR C_DR_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_TIMESTAMP C_TIMESTAMP_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.RESERVE1 RESERVE1_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve2 reserve2_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve3 reserve3_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve4 reserve4_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve5 reserve5_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve6 reserve6_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve7 reserve7_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve8 reserve8_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.reserve9 reserve9_TB_ATTR_GROUP , TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_MAT_CODE C_MAT_CODE_TB_ATTR_GROUP
from TB_ATTR_GROUP WHERE 1=1
AND TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID = #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbAttrGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and length(c_mat_code) = 11 ORDER BY c_mat_code

and TB_ATTR_GROUP.C_PARENT_ID = #{iwipAgroupM1s1.cMatCodeTbMatterGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY c_mat_code
